entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The isolation "Guidelines" were NOT Trump's. Those GUIDELINES were from CDC, Dr Fauci and other Medical Experts that Trump resisted. Trump wanted as LITTLE disruption to the economy to the point where he LIED about the number of coronavirus cases to keep their numbers low.
